name: Burger's Please
description:
Burger's Please is a prototype for a hopefully, future turn based RPG

I plan on expanding this into a much larger and more expansive game but for now, this prototype has the core mechanics in place!

Turn based combat with a funny cast of characters and much more!

Controls:

WASD/arrows to move

Space to interact

use mouse to click on GUI

Assets:

All assets except for sound, and the background for battles were made by me.

Overworld Music: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action (Ending, SubspaceAudio)

Battle Music: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action (Level 3, SubSpaceAudio)

Boss Music: https://opengameart.org/content/egyptian-fortress-boss (Spring Spring)

Battle Background: https://github.com/ryancoletta/Earthbound-Battle-Background-Unity
